title: Wanmei Shijie: Shuang Shi Ji
synopsis:
The story is set in a fantasy world, where families use food to determine their status. The Shi family, as the head of the four major families, is embroiled in fierce internal strife. Shi Hao's cousins ​​steal his "Supreme Bone Broth Treasure" through shameless means, causing his family to scatter and disappear. Shi Hao is protected and raised in hiding by his butler grandfather. After growing up, he is sent by his butler grandfather to the New Perfect Chef's Hall, where a group of students study and strive to become top-notch chefs. Each episode revolves around the theme of cooking the most delicious and unparalleled dishes, resulting in a series of farcical events.

(Source: Bangumi, translated)
